name: Bitlocker Master Key (FVEK) Extraction
author: Danil Bazin <danil.bazin@hsc.fr>
description:
This module enumerates ways to decrypt Bitlocker volume and if a recovery key is stored locally
        or can be generated, dump the Bitlocker master key (FVEK)

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.

options.name: DRIVE_LETTER
options.description: Dump informations from the DRIVE_LETTER encrypted with Bitlocker

options.name: RECOVERY_KEY
options.description: Use the recovery key provided to decrypt the Bitlocker master key (FVEK)
